removeAllFilesByClient - Variable in class database.Database
the prepared statement for removing all files of a client from db
removeFile - Variable in class database.Database
the prepared statement for getting files with min size

the prepared statement for adding online clients to db
ResultList - Class in client

ResultList - Class in server
Description of the ResultList class.
Result list is a way to represent DB queries results to make it easier for processing.
